metadata.title: Movo DOM2 3.5mm TRS Omni-Directional Calibrated Condenser Microphone for DJI Osmo Handheld 4K Camera and Other 3.5mm TRS Devices
features: Direct 3.5mm TRS Attachment - Suitable DJI Osmo Handheld 4K Camera, Portable Recorders, & Other 3.5mm TRS Devices
Impediance Matched for the DJI Osmo
1 Year Movo Warranty with Fast and Friendly Support
description: Transducer: Electret Condesnor  Polar Pattern: Omni-directional  Frequency Range: 35Hz ~ 18kHz  Signal/Noise: 74dB SPL  Sensitivity: -30dB +/- 3dB / 0dB=1V/Pa, 1kHZ  Connector: 3.5mm DJI Osmo Connector Product Weight: 17g  Warranty: 1 year, manufacturer warranty
